text: Me saghon itir kantrin igharazir kabar kalabusɨn ikɨ, na gɨnɨghnɨgh kamaghɨn fogh suam, me uan navir averiabar aven akɨrim ragha na gasara, ezɨ arazir kam bar na abɨra. Me uan damazir kurabar aseba bagha pamtem garava, bar dagh ifonge, ezɨ arazir kam na gamima, kɨ bar me baseme. Me fo, me arazir kurar kɨ ifongezir puvatɨzir avɨribagh ami. Eghtɨ me uan arazir kurar mɨzɨrɨzir amiziba bagh bar aghumsigham.
